item.description:
Each meeting we have one or two old members and a few new members. Everybody has a good time and gets to meet new people and practice their Italian.

John Jordan's classes are still going on downstairs in Cafe Paradiso. If you are the first to arrive for the group, feel free to come downstairs and watch until other members arrive.

A prossima
-Warren Agin

group.name: The Boston Italian Language Meetup Group & Luned√¨ Italiano
